Docs.summary: Represents a specific location within a specific file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks CodeLinePragma can be used to represent a specific location within a file. This type of object is often used after compilation by debugging tools to store locations of associated code elements, such as position references associated with compiler warnings and errors.
